name: Rainbow Crusade
description:
I made this game in a week or so for a little competition between me, and my friends, the theme was RAINBOW. I made a game about a slime mage going through the rainbow. Hope you'll all like it

Controls:

W and S - changing tracks
E - shooting

Credits:

Art - KubaJaky

Music:
(Menu) Bounce Ball by Twin Musicom
(Gameplay) Dance Dont Delay by Twin Musicom
(Death) Rhodesia Background by Twin Musicom
(High Score) Hat the Jazz by Twin Musicom
(Boss) Epic Battle by Twin Musicom

SFX - Soundly

Font - Mainlux
